p: With a median follow-up time of 52 months, 74 patients were evaluable. Overall, 24 patients died, four during treatment (2 from cardiac arrest, 1 with pneumonia and 1 with progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy, after cycle 3) and 20 during follow-up (16 due to progressive disease, 1 from pancreatic adenocarcinoma, 1 from cardiac arrest and 2 from unknown causes).
